remarks: A uniform limit of integrable functions is integrable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)
statement:
itgulm.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
itgulm.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
itgulm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> L^1 ) $.
itgulm.u $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~~>u ` S ) G ) $.
itgulm.s $e |- ( ph -> ( vol ` S ) e. RR ) $.
iblulm $p |- ( ph -> G e. L^1 ) $.
